§72022§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oMany studies have shown that some species of microorganism A (or plant extracts) can inhibit other species of microorganism B (bacteria or fungi), andthis inhibiting effect can reduce the birth rate of microorganism B.
Consequently, the density of B is inversely proportional to the density of A. Thus, using an inverse proportional function to modelling the inhibiting effect is very reasonable\u00a7r
